name: Astrocoins
description:
-------------------START DISCLAIMER-------------------

This game was created for the 2nd 1-bit weekend.

I didn't get to finish it, but still wanted to show you guys my effort.

If by some chance I win, I want my winnings to go the 2nd place because I didn't finish completing the game in time.

-------------------END DISCLAIMER-------------------

In this game you challenge spaceships to a game of cards. These cards will contain the zodiac elements of all the 12 different zodiac signs. counter the elements to win and get paid in Astrocoins.

What can the cards do?

You play the cards to counter certain elements:

Fire beats Earth

Earth beats Water

Water beats Fire

Air beats Fire, but is beaten by everything else. If you win the round with this card, you will regain one hull.

Sadly this game isn't finished yet, so the usability of the cards haven't been implemented yet. As well as the feature of Astrocoins.
